title: Patient Support Programs - Cancer Care - Englewood Health
description: As a patient at The Lefcourt Family Cancer Treatment and Wellness Center at Englewood Health, you have access to many support services and educational programs.
cleaned_text: Patient Support Programs Patient Support Services As a patient at The Lefcourt Family Cancer Treatment and Wellness Center, you have access to many support services and educational programs, including: Patient Navigator Your [patient navigator](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/patient-support-programs/patient-navigation) serves as your direct contact within The Lefcourt Family Cancer Treatment and Wellness Center to answer questions about your care, facilitate communication among your care providers, connect you with resources, and more. Genetic Counseling Our [Cancer Risk Assessment and Genetic Counseling Program](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/cancer-risk-assessment-genetic-counseling-program) is available to advise individuals and families with a history of cancer about their increased risk. Integrative Medicine Our [Graf Center for Integrative Medicine](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine) is located within our cancer center building. It offers acupuncture, meditation, massage therapy and Reiki, nutritional counseling, smoking cessation, yoga, and more to help minimize nausea, reduce pain, lower blood pressure, and relieve stress and anxiety. TLC: Treatment Learning Course Our web-based [educational material](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/patient-support-programs/tlc-treatment-learning-course) offers an overview of what you can expect as a patient. Palliative Medicine [Palliative medicine](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/patient-support-programs/palliative-medicine) focuses on improving your quality of life from the time of diagnosis, throughout your treatment, and afterward. This is achieved by preventing and treating the symptoms and side effects of cancer and its therapy. Nutritional Counseling Our [registered dietitian](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/patient-support-programs/nutritional-counseling) works in partnership with your care team to assess your diet, determine your needs, and set goals to follow a healthy diet. Support Groups [Support groups and other services](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer/patient-support-programs/support-groups-and-other-services) are available to help you address practical matters in your care and provide psychosocial support to you and your family before, during, and after your treatment. Survivorship Care After going through cancer treatment, cancer survivors have unique medical and psychosocial needs. We develop cancer survivorship care plans to help you and your care team address these issues.
